backend/main.mo: Backend canister handling authorization, user profiles, and storing volunteer, contact, and donation submissions with admin-protected query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a text update task to affected frontend files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file listing short summaries for all main frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root container, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all site routes wrapped in a shared headerâ€“footer layout.
frontend/src/components/FormStatusBanner: Reusable alert component showing success or error messages with icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying branding, navigation links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing the authenticated or anonymous backend actor with identity-based reinitialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNgoSubmissions.ts: Defines React Query mutation hooks to submit volunteer interests, contact messages, and donation pledges through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles and custom themed CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission, vision, values, and team member information using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission via React Query, plus contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Provides a donation pledge form with validation and impact examples, submitting pledges through React Query.
frontend/src/pages/GetInvolvedPage.tsx: Volunteer signup page with validation, form submission, and a list of volunteer opportunity categories.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero content, impact metrics, featured programs, and latest updates sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsImpactPage.ts: Displays multiple NGO programs with status, descriptions, impact stats, and locations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
